mapper.select: select m.* from sys_role_menu rm left join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select DISTINCT m.* from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select m.url, GROUP_CONCAT(r.code SEPARATOR ',') as ofRoles from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id where m.visible = '0' and m.url = #{url}
